name: Leo
profile_summary: As a skilled software developer, I bring a strong foundation in back-end development, with a focus on creating scalable and efficient applications. My experience with Java and Python allows me to craft elegant solutions to complex problems, and I'm proficient in utilizing AWS services to deploy and manage cloud-based infrastructure. With a personal project hosted on GitHub, I'm committed to ongoing development and refinement of my work, actively contributing to my open-source portfolio.
